option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the rawacf format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates an index of a rawacf format file.

description.p: Creates an index of a rawacf format file.
The index is written to standard output.
Index files cannot be created for raw (dat) format files.

example.description: Create an index file for the rawacf format file "20040830.gbr.rawacf". The index is writen to the file "20040830.gbr.rawinx".
